ygData.messageBody:
You know, it's funny. We have this thread about being a tank vs.
being a healer as a cleric, and then we see this cleric only weapon
and it basically screams, "be a tank!" I mean, yaulp III, and the
stats are mightily impressive. So, it would seem that Verant wants
us to be a tank. Otherwise, it would have had moderate damage but
like some really good effect like the cleanse effect of the SSOL but
have like +20 wisdom or something impressive.


>
>From: srutkowski@...
>
>Even if I was given the opportunity to loot that weapon, I probably
>wouldn't.
>The only reason I might loot it is for the novelty or for trade- isn't it
>no
>drop? If so, there goes that thought. I'll take my Charred Guardian
>Shield and
>soon completed Paw anyday over that weapon. Wow, a whole what- maybe 60
>pts of
>damage to something that has 2K-5K hitpoints? If it had some +wis like the
>shaman or druid only weapons (those in the game and being implemented),
>then
>maybe.
>
>Oh well, I don't really need a weapon anyway, but thanks for thinking of us
>Verant. Oh, wait a minute..... you think clerics are so balanced that you
>don't
>want to give us weapon that may help us do our job? You're right on class
>balance, but never mind the thanks :)
>
>Ailamil
